attributes.action: Make sending kids to school optional and cancel charges for absence
attributes.additional_details: As the covid-19 cases are on the rise and there’s a second lockdown coming, it is not safe for kids from different household to mix up at school.
attributes.background: To give the parents the option of deciding whether they want to send their kids to school or not. They can continue online classes. Stop charging parents for not sending their kids to school.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065
